title: 2 BEDROOM 2 BATH IN DUBOCE TRIANGLE
posting_body: With a New Angle on Urban Luxe, Duboce offers San Francisco Boutique-Style Living
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 902 Sq.
Duboce Triangle is a vibrant and highly-desirable neighborhood infused with color and culture.
The Duboce is a boutique-style apartment community that blends high style with urban luxury.
The walking score is at a phenomenal 98.
Distinctly tranquil with a bustling nightlife and remarkable shopping of the Castro and the Mission are mere steps away.
Embracing an urban retro aesthetic, Duboce provides stellar community features, remarkable amenities and pet-friendly living options.

From our polished porcelain tile flooring and dual-tone cabinets to our beautiful subway tile backsplashes and Caesarstone quartz countertops, Duboce offers classic living and will quickly become your happy place.
Perfect for entertaining friends and family, each apartment home provides staple items for a fun, yet functional space that will enhance your living experience.
With one- and two-bedroom apartment rentals and a variety of floor plans, Duboce is ideal for those seeking a walkable home life and an effortless commute.
Whether enjoying a BBQ with friends and family or soaking up the sun on our expansive roof deck, residents at Duboce enjoy exciting features that allow them to feel connected and comfortable.
- Fiber Optic Wired for High-Speed Internet Access
- Expansive Roof Deck with Hot Tub
- Apartment Views of Quiet Interior Courtyard
- Multiple Technology Bus Stops Within Walking Distance
- Sundeck, BBQ and Fire Pit Areas
Combined Gross Income needs to be at least 3x the monthly rent.

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
